com.burstly.conveniencelayer
Class Burstly

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.conveniencelayer.Burstly

public class Burstly
extends Object

Burstly is a singleton which takes care of initializing and shutting down the SDK as well as keeping a list of BurstlyViews associated with each activity so that they can be notified of activity pause and resume events.
